attributes.action: allow people to sell their microsoft software legitimately on ebay
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Microsoft sees adverts on ebay from individuals selling their own Microsoft software like windows xp and then complain that it breaches copyright and then has the item removed. But if it can be proved that they are legal genuine copies then why remove it.Microsoft being greedy.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
